data.title: Drew Sidora Announces The Passing Of Her Father
data.meta_description: Drew Sidora has revealed that she and her family are mourning the loss of her father who passed away from Alzheimer Disease.
data.text:
Prayers Up for Drew Sidora and her family.

The RHOA cast member revealed that her father, Dr. Robert Andrew Jordan, has passed away. On her Instagram, she wrote, “It is at this time with a heavy heart and great sadness that we mourn the passing of my father Dr. Robert Andrew Jordan.”

She continued, “There are no words to describe the grief in my heart with his passing. The love he showed as a husband, father, uncle, grandfather, physician, and so much more to everyone he met was truly unmatched. His legacy and memories will forever be cherished through all he met and loved, and the family asks for privacy during this time.”

In a separate post, she posted a video of her father with his family and wrote that her father passed away from Alzheimer’s disease.

Our thoughts and prayers are with Drew and her family during this time.
